property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: If this attack deals damage, gain X vitality. X equals this attack's damage minus its printed damage (minimum 0).E Commit: Your attack gets +X damage. X equals the control of the preceding card in your card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: Your attack gets +X damage. X equals the block modifier of the preceding card in your card pool. If this attack was played during your opponent's turn and deals 10 or more damage to your opponent, your opponent's Combat Phase ends immediately.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If your opponent's hand size is greater than yours, your attack gets +X damage. X equals 3 times the difference between your opponent's and your hand size. If your opponent has at least twice as many cards in their hand than you do, your attack is unblockable.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: If your attack deals damage, gain X vitality. X equals your attack's damage minus its printed damage (minimum 0).E Discard 1 momentum: Your attack gets +X damage. X equals 5 minus the control of the attack that precedes this attack in your card pool. Only playable if you have another attack in your ard pool (minimum 0).

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit 2 foundations: Gain 5 vitality. If this would take you over your maximum vitality, this attack has its damage increased by the excess.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack deals damage, gain X vitality. X equals this attack's damage minus its speed (minimum 0).

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: This attack gets +X damage. X equals 4 minus the lowest control printed on an attack in your card pool (minimum 0).

property.name: CardText
property.value: If this attack is completely blocked, it still deals half damage (rounded up).E Discard 2 momentum: If this attack deals at least three times its printed damage, your opponent may only play attacks during their next turn.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack and the next attack you play this turn deals damage, gain X vitality. X equals 5 minus the lowest control printed on a card in your card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: Commit 1 foundation: This attack gets +1 damage and you gain 1 vitality.Astaroth E Discard 2 momentum: If this attack deals damage, your opponent's Combat Phase ends after this attack resolves.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack deals damage, your next weapon attack this turn gets +2 damage. Only playable if you have gained vitality this Combat Phase.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: When you would gain vitality, for the rest of this Enhance Step, this attack gets +X damage instead. X equals the amount of vitality you would have gained.

property.name: CardText
property.value: If this attack is completely blocked, it still deals half damage (rounded up).E: This attack gets -2 damage. Until the end of your turn, every attack you play gets +2 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Commit, discard 12 momentum, remove this card from the game: Take another turn after this one.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: If the first card in your card pool is an attack, this attack gets +X damage. X equals the control of the first card in your card pool.E Commit: If this attack deals damage, gain X vitality. X equals the highest control in your card pool minus this attack's control (minimum 0).

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit, discard 1 momentum: This attack gets +X damage. X equals the total control printed on All attacks preceding this attack in your card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: If this attack deals damage, your next weapon attack gets +2 damage. If your character is tAller than your opponent's character, your next weapon attack gets +4 damage instead.Astaroth E: If your attack deals damage, gain 2 vitality.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: If you gain vitality as a result of your attack dealing damage, during your next attack this turn your opponent's block modifiers get +X. X equals the amount of vitality you gained.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: Reveal the top card of your deck. Your attack gets +X speed. X equals the revealed card's block modifier.R: After your opponent attempts to block your attack, reveal the top card of your deck. If the revealed card's control is higher than the block modifier of the block, draw it.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: Commit 1 foundation: Choose a number. Reveal 1 random face down card in your opponent's momentum. If the revealed card's difficulty or control matches your chosen number, this attack gets +X speed. X equals the chosen number. Discard the revealed card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F: Reveal the top card of your deck. The next attack you play this turn gets +X speed. X equals double the revealed card's block modifier. If the revealed card is not a block, draw it.E: Draw X cards. X equals your opponent's character's hand size minus the number of cards in your hand (minimum 0)

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit: After your opponent attempts to block 1 of your attacks and fails, draw X cards. X equals the block modifier of your attack.E Commit: If this attack deals damage, your next attack this turn gets +X speed. X equals the total of All printed block modifiers in your card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack deals damage, reveal the top card of your deck. If the revealed card's attack zone matches this attack's zone, draw it.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If the block zone of the last card played as a block by your opponent matches an attack zone in your card pool, this attack gets +X speed. X equals the last block modifier in your opponent's card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack deals damage, your next attack this turn gets +X speed. X equals your next attack's block modifier.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard 1 momentum: If this attack deals damage, your opponent looks at their momentum and discards 2 cards from their momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack deals damage, your next attack this turn gets +2 speed. If that attack deals damage, reveal the top card of your deck. If the revealed card has a block modifier that matches any block modifier in your staging area, draw it.

property.name: CardText
property.value: If this attack is completely blocked, it still deals half damage (rounded up).E Discard X momentum: Draw X cards. Your opponent may take up to X cards played as blocks from their card pool and add them to their momentum. X may not be more than the number of cards in your opponent's card pool played as blocks.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: For the rest of this turn, play with the top card of your deck revealed. For the rest of this turn, if your attack's block modifier matches the current revealed card's block modifier, your attack gets +X speed. X equals the current revealed card's block modifier

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If your opponent attempts to block this attack, this attack gets +X speed. X equals your opponent's block modifier.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: Before your opponent attempts to block this attack, they reveal the top 3 cards of their deck. If any of the revealed cards could block this attack, you may choose 1 card that your opponent could block with. Your opponent must block with the chosen card. If non of the revealed cards were chosen, your opponent may block as normal.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: Your attack with a block modifier that matches a block modifier printed on a card in your staging area gets +X speed. X equals the highest block modifier in your staging area.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Commit: Choose a number. Reveal the top card of your deck. If the revealed card's block modifier matches your chosen number, draw it.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit: Before you attempt to block an attack, reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. If any of the revealed cards' block zones match the attack's zone, you may attempt to block with that card as though it were in your hand. If not, you may attempt to block as normal. Take any revealed cards you did not block with and add them to the bottom of your deck in any Order.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard 3 momentum: If this attack deals damage, your opponent discards their entire momentum and your next attack this turn gets +X speed. X equals the amount of momentum your opponent discarded this way.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: Each player reveals 1 card in their momentum: If your revealed card has a higher block modifier than your opponent's, your attack gets +X speed. If your revealed card has a lower block modifier than your opponent's, your opponent discards their revealed card. X equals your revealed card's block modifier.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Commit, add 1 asset from your staging area to your momentum face up: Your opponent discards X momentum. X equals the asset's difficulty.F Commit, discard 1 face-up card in your momentum: For the rest of this turn, each player may only play 1 enhance per attack.

property.name: CardText
property.value: First F: Add 1 ready foundation from your staging area to your momentum. If you do, you may add 1 of your opponent's foundations to their momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Discard 1 face up card from your momentum: After an attack is played, choose 1 enhance ability printed on 1 of your opponent's cards. That ability may not be played this Enhance Step.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: If you block this attack, your opponent discards 1 of their momentum.R Commit: After one of your abilities causes your opponent to discard cards from their momentum, they discard 1 additional momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Commit: Your opponent discards 2 of their momentum. You may play this ability if this card is face up in your momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: If this attack is completely blocked, it still deals half damage (rounded up).E: If your opponent has played an ability printed on their character card during this Enhance Step, commit that character card. Your opponent may not ready their character card until after your next Ready Phase.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard 1 momentum: Neither player may play enhances during this attack's Enhance Step.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If you have 2 or fewer cards in your hand, this attack gets 'Multiple: 1'. Any Multiple copies of this card get 'Powerful: 2'.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: Each player adds 1 of the foundations in their opponent's staging area to its owner's momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack deals damage, add 1 asset from your staging area to your momentum face up. Add 1 asset from your hand that you could normAlly play to your staging area.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard 1 momentum: If this attack deals damage, your next mid attack this turn gets +3 damage and 'E Destroy 2 foundations: Add 2 of your opponent's foundations in their staging areas to their momentum.'

property.name: CardText
property.value: After you block with this attack, you may discard 1 face up card from your momentum to play this card as a Reversal.E: If this attack played as a Reversal deals damage, choose 1 enhance ability printed on your opponent's character. That ability may not be played until the beginning of your next turn.

property.name: CardText
property.value: This card may be played as a block against any throws as if this card had a mid block of +X. X equals the speed of the throw.E Add 1 foundation from your card pool to your momentum: If this attack played as a Reversal deals damage, add 1 foundation from your opponent's card pool to their momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack is blocked, your next attack this turn gets 'E Add 1 foundation from your staging area to your momentum: Your opponent adds 1 of their committed foundations to their momentum.'

property.name: CardText
property.value: R: After you add an asset to your momentum, commit 1 foundation that has an enhance ability in your opponent's staging area.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E commit: Your opponent may not play enhance abilities printed on foundations this Enhance Step.E Commit: If your opponent's attack deals damage, take this foundation and add it to your momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: If your attack's current damage would reduce your opponent to 0 vitality, each player adds 1 foundation in their staging area to their momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Discard 1 momentum: If you have more cards in your staging area than your opponent, your opponent may not play enhance cards or enhance abilities this turn.R Commit: After your opponent plays an enhance card or ability, cancel its effects.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: When this attack or any of its Multiple copies deal damage, discard that attack from your card pool and gain X vitality. X equals the damage dealt.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: All of your opponent's control checks get +2 this turn. Until the end of this turn, after your opponent successfully makes a control check, gain 2 vitality.First F: Destroy this foundation. All control checks get -3 this turn. If this card is committed, your opponent may play this ability.

property.name: CardText
property.value: First F: Gain X vitality. X equals your momentum.E Discard 2 momentum: If your attack deals damage, permanently reduce your opponent's character's hand size by 1. Only playable if your attack is an [All], [Death], and [Life] attack and your opponent's current hand size is 5 or more.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Commit: Add 1 random face down card from your momentum to your card pool face up. This card is not cleared during your next End Phase. While this card is in your card pool, All control values get +X and All vitality gains are increased by X. X equals the card's printed control or difficulty, whichever is lower.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Commit 1 weapon asset: Attach this card to the asset. While this card is attached, the asset gets 'While this card is committed, your opponent's character's hand size is reduced by 1 (to a minimum of 5).'F Discard 1 momentum: Gain 3 vitality.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R commit: After you gain vitality, place X Whip tokens on this card. X equals the amount of vitality gained.F Commit, remove X Whip tokens from this card: Your Combat Phase ends. Until the end of your next turn, All control checks get +X.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack is completely blocked, add it to your staging area and place 3 Whip tokens on it.F Remove 1 Whip token from this card and discard 1 momentum: Once per turn, gain X vitality or All control checks this turn get +X. X equals the number of Whip tokens on this card. Playable from your staging area. If this card has no whip tokens on it, destroy it.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack deals damage, All control checks for the rest of this turn get +1. Your opponent may discard 2 cards to make the modifier -1 instead.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack and All of its Multiple copies deal damage, the control check for your next attack this turn gets +2. Only playable if there is at least 1 Multiple copy of this card in your card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard 1 momentum: If this attack deals damage and if your opponent has fewer cards in their hand than you have in your hand, gain 2 vitality.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack deals damage, add it to your momentum face up.While this card is face up in your momentum, your opponent's character's hand size gets -1 for each weapon asset they have in play. Your opponent may destroy 1 of their weapon assets during their Ready Phase to discard this card from your momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard 1 momentum: Gain X vitality. X equals 4 minus the control of the momentum discarded for this ability (minimum 0).

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: Before this attack deals 1 or more damage, reduce that damage to 0 instead. During your End Phase, add this card to your momentum face up.While this card is face up in your momentum, you may choose 1 card in your opponent's discard pile and add it to their hand immediately before their Draw Step.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack deals damage, All control checks get -1 for the rest of this turn.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit: After you play the Powerful ability on your attack, you may gain vitality equal to the damage bonus instead of adding the damage to your attack.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Commit: Make a control check. Place X Whip tokens on this card. X equals 6 minus the control check (minimum 0). Only playable if there are 0 Whip tokens on this card.F Commit, remove All Whip tokens from this card: All control checks get +X until your opponent's next End Phase. X equals the number of Whip tokens removed from this card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard 1 momentum: If this attack deals damage, gain X vitality. X equals the control of the momentum discarded for this ability.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Discard 1 momentum: Before your opponent's Draw Step, reveal your opponent's momentum and choose 1 card. Add that card to your opponent's hand.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Discard 1 card: After either player plays a card or ability, remove 1 card in that player's discard pile from the game.F Discard X momentum, commit X foundations: Once per turn, draw X cards.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Discard 1 momentum: After your opponent discards a card from their card pool due to one of their card effects during their Combat Phase, their Combat Phase ends.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit: After your opponent adds any number of cards to their card pool from somewhere other than their hand, discard All cards they added to their card pool this way.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard 1 momentum: If you have less momentum than your opponent, draw X cards. X equals your opponent's momentum.Seong Mi-na E Commit 1 foundation: Add the top card of your deck to your momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: If this attack is completely blocked, it deals half damage (rounded up).E Discard 1 momentum: If this attack deals damage, draw 2 cards.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack's first Multiple copy deals damage, draw 1 card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Discard 2 momentum: After your opponent discards any number of cards from their card pool during their Combat Phase, take X cards from the top of their deck and add them face down to their card pool. X equals the number of cards they discarded.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit, discard 1 momentum: After your opponent adds a card to their hand during their Combat Phase, draw 1 card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit, discard 1 momentum: If your opponent's attack deals damage, draw 1 card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R: After your opponent adds cards to their hand during the Combat Phase, you may either draw X cards, or your opponent discards the top X cards of their deck. X equals the amount of cards added to your opponent's hand.F Commit: If your opponent has more cards in hand than you do, add cards from your momentum to your hand until you both have the same number of cards.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Discard 1 momentum: Before you take damage from an attack, you may either add the momentum discarded for this ability to your hand or reduce the damage of the attack by the difficulty of the momentum discarded for this ability (to a minimum of 1).

property.name: CardText
property.value: R: Before your opponent makes a control check to play an attack, that check is automaticAlly successful (no control check necessary). Search your deck for any card with a block, reveal it, and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck. If your opponent's attack is not blocked, its damage is doubled.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Destroy this asset: After your opponent draws any number of cards, they discard an equal number of cards from the top of their deck.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: When this attack (or any of its Multiple copies) deals damage, each player draws 1 card after each attack deals damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack is not blocked, add this card to your momentum face up.While this card is face up in your momentum, any damage you take from an attack is reduced by that attack's control (to a minimum of 1).

property.name: CardText
property.value: If this attack is played as a Reversal after you completely block an attack, this attack gets 'Powerful: 3' and 'E: If this attack deals damage, draw 2 cards.'

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit 1 foundation: Each player draws 1 card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack is not blocked, add this card to your momentum face up.E Discard this card from your momentum: This attack gets -3 damage. Only playable while face up in your momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: Draw 3 cards. Only playable if your opponent has drawn cards this Combat Phase.

property.name: CardText
property.value: After playing this card as a block, your opponent may not draw any cards for the remainder of this Combat Phase. If your opponent has drawn any cards this Combat Phase, they discard the top 3 cards of their deck.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If your opponent has drawn any cards this Combat Phase, they discard the top 2 cards of their deck.

property.name: CardText
property.value: If this attack is completely blocked, it still deals half damage (rounded up).E: If this attack deals damage and if your opponent has drawn any cards this Combat Phase, they discard X cards from the top of their deck. X equals the damage dealt by this attack.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Destroy this foundation: Each player draws a number of cards equal to their character's hand size and then removes cards in their hand from the game until the number of cards in their hand is equal to their character's hand size.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Discard 1 momentum: Before you take damage, if you have more vitality than your opponent, reduce the damage by the control of the momentum discarded for this ability.

property.name: CardText
property.value: While this card is committed and if you have more momentum than your opponent, any damage dealt to you is reduced by 1. You may choose to leave this card committed during your Ready Phase.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit: After your opponent draws 1 or more cards due to a card effect, draw X cards. X equals twice the number of cards drawn by your opponent. You may not ready this card during your next Ready Phase.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Destroy this foundation, discard 2 momentum: Before this attack deals damage, reduce that damage by 1.
